page-index-hero-image-alt: An illustration of a futuristic city, representing the Byteco ecosystem.
page-index-meta-description: Byteco is a global, decentralized platform for money and new kinds of applications. On Byteco, you can write code that controls money, and build applications accessible anywhere in the world.
page-index-description: Byteco is the community-run technology powering the cryptocurrency, Byte (BTO) and thousands of decentralized applications.
page-index-get-started-description: Byteco.org is your portal into the world of Byteco. The tech is new and ever-evolving – it helps to have a guide. Here's what we recommend you do if you want to dive in.
page-index-get-started-image-alt: Illustration of a person working on a computer.
page-index-get-started-wallet-descriptio: A wallet lets you connect to Byteco and manage your funds.
page-index-get-started-wallet-image-alt: Illustration of a robot with a vault for a body, representing an Byteco wallet.
page-index-get-started-bto-description: BTO is the currency of Byteco – you can use it in applications.
page-index-get-started-bto-image-alt: Illustration of a group of people marvelling at an byte (BTO) glyph in awe.
page-index-get-started-dapps-description: Dapps are applications powered by Byteco. See what you can do.
page-index-get-started-dapps-image-alt: Illustration of a doge using a computer.
page-index-get-started-devs-description: If you want to start coding with Byteco, we have documentation, tutorials, and more in our developer portal.
page-index-get-started-devs-image-alt: An illustration of a hand creating an BTO logo made of lego bricks.
page-index-what-is-Byteco-description: Byteco is a technology that's home to digital money, global payments, and applications. The community has built a booming digital economy, bold new ways for creators to earn online, and so much more. It's open to everyone, wherever you are in the world – all you need is the internet.
page-index-what-is-Byteco-image-alt: Illustration of a person peering into a bazaar, meant to represent Byteco.
page-index-defi-description: Today, billions of people can’t open bank accounts, others have their payments blocked. Byteco's decentralized finance (DeFi) system never sleeps or discriminates. With just an internet connection, you can send, receive, borrow, earn interest, and even stream funds anywhere in the world.
page-index-defi-image-alt: Illustration of hands offering an BTO symbol.
page-index-internet-description: Today, we gain access to 'free' internet services by giving up control of our personal data. Byteco services are open by default – you just need a wallet. These are free and easy to set up, controlled by you, and work without any personal info.
page-index-internet-image-alt: Illustration of a futuristic computer set up, powered by Byteco crystals.
page-index-developers-description: Byteco and its apps are transparent and open source. You can fork code and re-use functionality others have already built. If you don't want to learn a new language you can just interact with open-sourced code using JavaScript and other existing languages.
page-index-developers-code-example-descr: You can build a bank run by logic you've programmed.
You can create tokens that you can transfer and use across applications.
You can use existing languages to interact with Byteco and other applications.
You can reimagine existing services as decentralized, open applications.
page-index-network-stats-bto-price-expla: The latest price for 1 byte. You can buy as little as 0.000000000000000001 – you don't need to buy 1 whole ETH.
page-index-network-stats-tx-day-explaine: The number of transactions succesfully processed on the network in the last 24 hours.
page-index-network-stats-value-defi-expl: The amount of money in decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, the Byteco digital economy.
page-index-network-stats-nodes-explainer: Byteco is run by thousands of volunteers around the globe, known as nodes.
page-index-contribution-banner-descripti: This website is open source with hundreds of community contributors. You can propose edits to any of the content on this site, suggest awesome new features, or help us squash bugs.
page-index-contribution-banner-image-alt: An Byteco logo made of lego bricks.
page-index-tout-open-description: Byteco 2.0 is a program of interconnected upgrades designed to make Byteco more scalable, secure, and sustainable.
page-index-tout-open-image-alt: Illustration of a spaceship representing the increased power of Open.
page-index-tout-enterprise-description: See how Byteco can open up new business models, reduce your costs and future-proof your business.
page-index-tout-community-description: Byteco is all about community. It's made up of people from all different backgrounds and interests. See how you can join in.
page-index-tout-community-image-alt: Illustration of a group of builders working together.
page-index-nft-description: Byteco isn't just for digital money. Anything you can own can be represented, traded and put to use as non-fungible tokens (NFTs). You can tokenise your art and get royalties automatically every time it's re-sold. Or use a token for something you own to take out a loan. The possibilities are growing all the time.
page-index-nft-alt: An bto logo being displayed via hologram.
